long_description: The Timex Ironman 100-Lap digital watch features all-day white reflector display, as well as INDIGLO Night-Light and NIGHT-MODE(R) for easy use in low light and darkness. Oversize digits are easily readable at a glance, even while you're running. 100 hr. chronograph with lap/split option; 100-lap memory recall, automatic interval repetition counter, 199-lap counter, and 3-mode countdown timer. Includes 12/24 hour time format, 9 interval timers, 5 programmable alarms, 5 min. back-up alarm and second time zone with date display. Total Run chronograph format excludes rest periods for accurate times on long runs or bike rides. Training log stores workouts by date, including best lap, average lap and total segment time. The Timex Ironman 100-Lap digital watch is water-resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Timex Ironman 100-Lap digital watch features all-day white reflector display, as well as INDIGLO Night-Light and NIGHT-MODE(R) for easy use in low light and darkness.
